name: Facebook Security Shark
short_description:
Facebook Security Shark or Facebook Shark. The newest generation of protection!

NOTE: Firewall & Windows Protector, along with any other anti-virus software may ask you if you are sure you want to download this software because: The software does not ask the user for permission and confirmation to use their default browser. This is because the software is programmed to monitor your account and warn you with a PC 'information' message that the following people or person(s) have downloaded your pictures, viewed your pictures too long, viewed your profile too long, and in other words, stalked you. 

Facebook Security Shark will warn you on detection of 5 minute view of your profile/pictures, download of your pictures, and any other malicious detection.

FREE FOR A LIMITED TIME!
